Please check your input or contact our helpdesk if you require assistance.

onboardingCheckInboxComponent.descriptio:
You should have received an e-mail with a link to reset your password. 
In case you do not see the e-mail right away, please check your spam.

onboardingBankAccountAuthorizedComponent: Are you authorized to verify the bank account of {0}?

onboardingBankAccountIntroComponent.what: Youâ€™re about to fill in the bank account details: the name of the account, the account number and the sort code.

Next, you will be asked to fill in the first name, last name and the e-mail address of the person who will verify the bank account. This is the person who is authorized by the organisation to sign the mandate on the bank account. We will send an e-mail with an invitation to sign the mandate to the specified e-mail address.

Finally, this person will check the organisation details and the bank account details and the bank account will be verified. We will send a confirmation e-mail to you as soon as this is done. 
In case of any inaccuracies, the person verifying the bank account will be able to notify you (an e-mail will be sent stating that there are still some inaccuracies).
